(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  R1F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 6-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 4-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 65.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 45.57 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 55.79 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 33.88 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 392.25) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.04 cm2

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 5-#7

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 94.43 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.09 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 76.70 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.43
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 57.85 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 64.92 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -93.46 T
Mu,maj = -13.79 T-M
Mu,min = 34.73 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -86.57 T
Mu,maj = 31.72 T-M
Mu,min = 57.85 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.43
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -44.62 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.164 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.164 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(10) 柱設計及配筋完成
======================================================================================================================================================

|       1.00 %[C1]                |                |   o  0-#0               |
|                                 |                |   X- 5( 0)              |
| Maj.Av/S=  0.424<15-4>[C1]      |                |   Y- 5( 0)              |
|            0.174<3>[C2]         |                |   Hoop: 1-#4            |
| Min.Av/S=  0.424<15-4>[C1]      |                |   Ties: 3-#4 @ 10 - 15  |
|            0.174<11>[C2]        +----------------+         3-#4            |

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  15F B12(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 7-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 75.21 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 62.89 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.44
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 61.52 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.02 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================

Pu     = -93.20 T
Mu,maj = 12.01 T-M

As     = 81.00 cm2

Mu,maj = 36.97 T-M
Mu,min = 61.52 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.44
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      43.20 T (COMB3 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.174 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.174 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================
(major)

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.87 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  15F B8(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#7 + 8.87(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 7-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 131.66 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 75.18 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 112.28 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 55.29 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  15F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 7-#7 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 75.21 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 71.64 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 102.23 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.61 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -265.54 T
Mu,maj = 31.99 T-M
Mu,min = 8.36 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -300.72 T
Mu,maj = 10.94 T-M
Mu,min = 102.23 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

As,req = 90.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      36.88 T (COMB35 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.42
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      34.73 T (COMB3 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.083 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.083 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.42
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 20.58 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 39.33 (t-m)

柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -14.63 T (COMB52 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.033 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.033 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.55
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 100.62 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.28 (t-m)

Avh / S =      0.151 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.41
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 20.02 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 34.10 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.41
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -32.85 T (COMB9 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.090 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.090 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.44
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 62.00 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.47 (t-m)

主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.44
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.48 T (COMB7 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.185 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.185 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  R1F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 8-#7 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 4-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 45.61 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 84.85 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 33.97 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 78.52 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 8-#7 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 84.89 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.10 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 78.57 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.42
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 20.57 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 39.33 (t-m)

Mu,min = -13.34 T-M

Mu,min = -20.57 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂無梁傳入彎矩、或為最高樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_top_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.42
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -43.36 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.142 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.142 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

                          Pu(T)      Mumaj(T-m)        Vumaj(T)      Mumin(T-m)        Vumin(T)

            Top         -159.26           11.69           -9.41          -24.33           20.31
         Bottom         -166.06          -11.87           -9.41           26.46           20.31
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As,req = 81.00 cm2

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 55.51 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 41.05 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 63.85 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 71.66 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.29 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 86.75 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -166.06 T
Mu,maj = -11.87 T-M
Mu,min = 26.46 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -145.09 T
Mu,maj = -23.51 T-M
Mu,min = -63.85 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      22.77 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.103 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.103 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm

  D   = 70cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 41.07 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 77.40 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 93.51 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 79.03 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 98.54 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -334.83 T
Mu,maj = -35.70 T-M
Mu,min = 5.75 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -283.31 T
Mu,maj = -9.77 T-M
Mu,min = -77.40 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

As,req = 90.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -60.20 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

hc      =      65.73 cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  15F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 8-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 84.89 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 69.92 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  14F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 9-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 6-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 65.38 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 94.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 48.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 76.90 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 24.19 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 41.21 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 29.42 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 46.95 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -118.72 T
Mu,maj = -12.27 T-M
Mu,min = 11.17 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -91.15 T
Mu,maj = -13.60 T-M
Mu,min = -24.19 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      -8.60 T (COMB62 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.073 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.073 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

         Bottom         -147.63          -21.83          -16.49           15.46           13.63

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  15F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 48.21 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 92.30 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 23.22 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 44.40 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 30.61 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.60 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -147.63 T
Mu,maj = -21.83 T-M
Mu,min = 15.46 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -111.51 T
Mu,maj = -18.01 T-M
Mu,min = -23.22 T-M

主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -12.60 T (COMB78 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.098 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.098 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 526.00) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.87 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  15F B5(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#7 + 8.87(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 7-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 131.66 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 75.18 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 112.28 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 55.29 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 71.64 (t-m)

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 78.61 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 93.39 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 77.30 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 102.68 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.29 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -349.76 T
Mu,maj = 37.06 T-M
Mu,min = -7.42 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -371.43 T
Mu,maj = 12.20 T-M
Mu,min = -93.39 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

As,req = 90.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      61.26 T (COMB7 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  15F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 8-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 5-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 55.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 84.89 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 41.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 69.92 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  14F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 9-#7 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 6-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 65.38 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 94.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 48.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 76.90 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 24.90 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 42.42 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 28.59 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 45.62 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -121.24 T
Mu,maj = -11.90 T-M
Mu,min = -12.48 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -94.17 T
Mu,maj = 10.81 T-M
Mu,min = -24.90 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      -8.36 T (COMB66 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.039 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.039 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 66.88 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 63.07 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 87.71 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 79.16 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -168.62 T
Mu,maj = 9.63 T-M
Mu,min = -30.29 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -160.06 T
Mu,maj = 27.09 T-M
Mu,min = -66.88 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      28.63 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.066 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.066 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 23.26 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 44.47 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 30.57 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.52 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -146.65 T
Mu,maj = -21.66 T-M
Mu,min = -14.54 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -111.71 T
Mu,maj = 13.94 T-M
Mu,min = -23.26 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -12.51 T (COMB78 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.094 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.094 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(10) 柱設計及配筋完成

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 76.65 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.93 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 81.88 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 89.79 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -238.61 T
Mu,maj = -12.46 T-M
Mu,min = 27.81 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -209.72 T
Mu,maj = -27.81 T-M
Mu,min = -76.65 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -46.48 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm

T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.87 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  13F B8(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 15-#7 + 8.87(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#7
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 84.96 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 149.73 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 62.33 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 125.54 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 80.52 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 100.40 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 88.53 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 108.25 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -421.82 T
Mu,maj = -34.61 T-M
Mu,min = 4.91 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -363.11 T
Mu,maj = -6.40 T-M
Mu,min = -80.52 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

As,req = 90.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -57.70 T (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm

  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 75.19 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 104.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 55.28 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 83.84 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 29.63 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 47.29 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 32.34 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 49.05 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -163.79 T
Mu,maj = -14.06 T-M
Mu,min = 10.82 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -123.30 T
Mu,maj = -13.03 T-M
Mu,min = -29.63 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =       9.50 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.075 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.075 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =       4.73 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.039 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.039 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 84.74 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 104.46 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 88.54 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 108.26 (t-m)

Pu     = -441.38 T
Mu,maj = 35.22 T-M
Mu,min = -6.10 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -456.13 T
Mu,maj = 7.82 T-M
Mu,min = -103.87 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

As,req = 90.00 cm2
主筋: 18-#8  (As,pro = 91.21 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      58.66 T (COMB7 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.89 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 5-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.59 cm2 / cm

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 56.36 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 29.44 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.45 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 32.59 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm

  D   = 70cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 76.23 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.46 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 82.35 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 90.30 (t-m)

Mu,maj = -11.81 T-M
Mu,min = -29.16 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)

Mu,min = -76.23 T-M
