(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      65.45 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  9F B3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 145.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 108.98 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 79.77 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 68.50 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 47.87 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 73.86 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.37 (t-m)

Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  9F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 157.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 109.00 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 131.10 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 79.75 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  8F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 169.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 140.04 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.97 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 48.04 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 83.69 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.17 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -483.34 T
Mu,maj = 21.73 T-M
Mu,min = -14.27 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -571.81 T
Mu,maj = 19.73 T-M
Mu,min = -78.97 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      36.94 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 134.63 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 129.46 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 130.48 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 125.47 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -662.68 T
Mu,maj = 8.28 T-M
Mu,min = 24.62 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -635.01 T
Mu,maj = -22.65 T-M
Mu,min = -134.63 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      68.52 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.87 cm2

  8F B8(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 191.82 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.74 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 153.34 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 89.00 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 147.80 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 129.14 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 142.97 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 124.91 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -999.18 T
Mu,maj = 30.53 T-M
Mu,min = 1.73 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1010.19 T
Mu,maj = -1.91 T-M
Mu,min = -147.80 T-M
As     = 138.41 cm2

As,req = 140.94 cm2
主筋: 28-#8  (As,pro = 141.88 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      72.77 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  8F B12(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 157.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 123.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  7F B12(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 123.32 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.11 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 74.18 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.59 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 73.69 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.63 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -431.03 T
Mu,maj = 12.64 T-M
Mu,min = 10.70 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -517.32 T
Mu,maj = -5.61 T-M
Mu,min = -74.18 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      34.35 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

                          Pu(T)      Mumaj(T-m)        Vumaj(T)      Mumin(T-m)        Vumin(T)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
            Top         -962.45           31.64          -24.73           -1.61            1.23
         Bottom         -970.01          -30.52          -24.73            1.49            1.23
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
As,req = 90.00 cm2

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  8F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 145.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 108.98 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 122.48 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 79.77 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 153.34 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 129.18 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 142.38 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 124.74 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 142.77 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -970.01 T
Mu,maj = -30.52 T-M
Mu,min = 1.49 T-M
As     = 90.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -992.97 T
Mu,maj = 2.03 T-M
Mu,min = -142.77 T-M
As     = 124.42 cm2

As,req = 140.94 cm2
主筋: 28-#8  (As,pro = 141.88 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -72.17 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9000.00 cm2
Ac      =    7504.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.581 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  8F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 169.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 140.04 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  7F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 169.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 140.04 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 84.64 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.77 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 83.40 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 52.99 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -543.93 T
Mu,maj = 21.23 T-M
Mu,min = 15.46 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -636.60 T
Mu,maj = -5.17 T-M
Mu,min = -84.64 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      38.94 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.012 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.012 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

  8F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 145.88 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.57 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 114.30 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 404.75) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.04 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  8F B2(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.04(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 170.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.15 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 131.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 131.96 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 128.30 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 133.42 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 126.63 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 131.69 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -677.69 T
Mu,maj = -10.79 T-M
Mu,min = -24.24 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -597.53 T
Mu,maj = 21.82 T-M
Mu,min = -128.30 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -69.16 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  8F B3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 157.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 123.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  7F B3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 123.32 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.11 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 74.21 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.61 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 73.66 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.60 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -447.20 T
Mu,maj = 12.84 T-M
Mu,min = -12.44 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -540.12 T
Mu,maj = 14.18 T-M
Mu,min = -74.21 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      35.08 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50

Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 53.79 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 83.38 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 52.97 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -539.38 T
Mu,maj = 20.81 T-M
Mu,min = -15.23 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -646.64 T
Mu,maj = 21.40 T-M
Mu,min = -84.67 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      38.57 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.011 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.011 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  6F B12(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.32 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 133.56 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 128.43 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 137.12 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 137.31 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -730.93 T
Mu,maj = 7.96 T-M
Mu,min = 23.73 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -700.01 T
Mu,maj = -21.16 T-M
Mu,min = -133.56 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      71.12 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  6F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.13 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 131.71 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 146.28 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 127.81 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 153.95 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 137.06 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1096.66 T
Mu,maj = 30.81 T-M
Mu,min = 0.78 T-M
As     = 97.50 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1114.24 T
Mu,maj = -0.08 T-M
Mu,min = 153.95 T-M
As     = 144.10 cm2

As,req = 147.25 cm2
主筋: 30-#8  (As,pro = 152.01 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      76.85 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      35.67 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  7F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 121.68 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 53.60 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.38 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.63 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.88 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -76.20 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 146.18 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 127.72 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 154.06 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 137.15 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  7F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 121.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 157.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 88.96 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.14 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  6F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.32 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 53.15 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 73.57 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.11 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 74.30 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -489.36 T
Mu,maj = -12.10 T-M
Mu,min = -12.57 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -303.97 T
Mu,maj = 8.15 T-M
Mu,min = -53.15 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -37.09 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)

======================================================================================================================================================

Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 132.37 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 132.58 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 138.37 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 138.56 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      71.34 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  7F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 121.68 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 169.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 88.96 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  6F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 170.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.40 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 53.67 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.48 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.56 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.78 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -576.94 T
Mu,maj = -18.74 T-M
Mu,min = -13.37 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -358.02 T
Mu,maj = 10.67 T-M
Mu,min = -53.67 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -39.80 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.11 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 140.63 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 145.77 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 136.11 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 141.09 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -800.45 T
Mu,maj = -10.98 T-M
Mu,min = 21.23 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -805.22 T
Mu,maj = -22.57 T-M
Mu,min = 145.77 T-M
As     = 83.42 cm2

As,req = 83.42 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -74.06 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)

======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0

hc      =      80.73 cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 157.80 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 121.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 131.45 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 88.96 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 138.36 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 150.07 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 137.30 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 154.22 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1147.55 T
Mu,maj = -29.27 T-M
Mu,min = -1.58 T-M
As     = 97.50 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1168.84 T
Mu,maj = -2.40 T-M
Mu,min = -154.22 T-M
As     = 161.72 cm2

As,req = 180.96 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -76.64 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)
