(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  6F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.16 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.32 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 252.50) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  5F B10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 170.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 132.12 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.02 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 74.18 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.73 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 79.07 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -523.26 T
Mu,maj = -12.19 T-M
Mu,min = 11.79 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -323.84 T
Mu,maj = -15.39 T-M
Mu,min = -59.02 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.37 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 10-#8

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.40 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.13 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.60 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.63 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.88 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -639.03 T
Mu,maj = -18.24 T-M
Mu,min = 15.22 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -410.33 T
Mu,maj = -21.25 T-M
Mu,min = -59.13 T-M

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -41.18 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.013 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.013 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.14 (t-m)

考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 156.52 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 139.34 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 153.30 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 136.47 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1207.90 T
Mu,maj = 30.04 T-M
Mu,min = 0.87 T-M
As     = 97.50 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1216.21 T
Mu,maj = -2.20 T-M
Mu,min = -156.52 T-M
As     = 180.96 cm2

As,req = 180.96 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      75.56 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  6F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.32 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  5F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.25 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 170.07 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.14 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 132.12 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.03 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 72.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.72 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 80.40 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -535.06 T
Mu,maj = -11.76 T-M
Mu,min = -12.90 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -323.33 T
Mu,maj = 8.80 T-M
Mu,min = -58.03 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 64.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.62 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 158.23 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 98.11 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.32 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 138.05 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 138.24 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 143.55 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 138.48 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -817.48 T
Mu,maj = 7.88 T-M
Mu,min = -24.79 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -827.26 T
Mu,maj = -25.37 T-M
Mu,min = 143.55 T-M
As     = 86.41 cm2

As,req = 87.29 cm2
主筋: 20-#8  (As,pro = 101.34 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      73.35 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -41.14 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.007 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.007 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  6F B9(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.14 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 85.70 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 59.90 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 82.78 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 57.87 (t-m)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 137.34 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 137.52 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 176.59 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 170.30 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.38 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)

hc      =      65.73 cm

Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)

Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 154.46 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 137.50 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 169.14 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 147.32 (t-m)

Pu     = -1257.34 T
Mu,maj = 118.15 T-M
Mu,min = -5.46 T-M
As     = 133.18 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1312.29 T
Mu,maj = -2.75 T-M
Mu,min = 169.14 T-M
As     = 233.91 cm2

主筋: 48-#8  (As,pro = 243.22 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      77.00 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(104.13, 145.00, 489.00) = 104.13 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (104.13 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 3.11 cm2

  5F G12(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 79.04 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 64.94 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 78.21 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 58.90 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      38.21 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.002 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.002 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 137.53 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 154.49 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 147.21 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 169.01 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB9 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1229.22 T
Mu,maj = -117.71 T-M
Mu,min = 6.58 T-M
As     = 122.42 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1278.47 T
Mu,maj = 4.10 T-M
Mu,min = -169.01 T-M
As     = 222.36 cm2

As,req = 237.70 cm2
主筋: 48-#8  (As,pro = 243.22 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.42 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.634 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.345 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  5F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 181.65 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 134.32 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 148.98 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 98.16 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  4F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 183.48 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 135.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 150.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.08 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 94.17 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 62.05 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 85.40 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 56.26 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -702.75 T
Mu,maj = 17.25 T-M
Mu,min = 14.45 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -848.67 T
Mu,maj = -13.47 T-M
Mu,min = -94.17 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.32 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(118.75, 145.00, 404.75) = 118.75 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (118.75 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.04 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  5F B2(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 4.04(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 11-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 146.84 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 182.33 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 107.29 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 140.94 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 108.20 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 142.17 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 137.91 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 142.95 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 169.86 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 176.12 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB17 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1123.27 T
Mu,maj = -2.23 T-M
Mu,min = -79.33 T-M
As     = 118.57 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -901.75 T
Mu,maj = -22.37 T-M
Mu,min = -176.12 T-M
As     = 156.29 cm2

As,req = 160.08 cm2
主筋: 32-#8  (As,pro = 162.14 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.61
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -75.93 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.21, 145.00, 489.00) = 106.21 cm

Y 方向 柱頂
  5F G10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 11-#8

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 130.80 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(106.21, 145.00, 489.00) = 106.21 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (106.21 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 3.24 cm2

Y 方向 柱底
  4F G10(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 3.24(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 135.36 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 171.70 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.05 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 131.76 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 64.42 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 78.57 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.37 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 78.97 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -584.62 T
Mu,maj = 11.44 T-M
Mu,min = -12.37 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -794.62 T
Mu,maj = 78.97 T-M
Mu,min = 7.41 T-M
As     = 74.65 cm2

As,req = 74.65 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.50
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.50
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      39.27 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.371 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      42.31 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 180.15 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 186.80 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.65
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      75.84 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.51
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 143.12 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 164.32 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.49
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 135.09 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 149.87 (t-m)

As,req = 213.24 cm2
主筋: 44-#8  (As,pro = 222.95 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.52
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.48
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      78.11 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 57.89 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 77.92 (t-m)

Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 60.98 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 82.07 (t-m)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)

Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.130 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  4F B4(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 135.41 (t-m)

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 150.39 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 10-#8

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 141.69 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 58.19 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 88.32 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 60.69 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 86.81 (t-m)

彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)

Mu,maj = -17.54 T-M
Mu,min = 15.53 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)

Mu,min = -58.19 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.49
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.51
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.01 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.010 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.010 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 176.05 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 153.34 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 143.49 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 124.98 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB2 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1427.78 T
Mu,maj = 25.68 T-M
Mu,min = 1.98 T-M
As     = 107.33 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1418.44 T
Mu,maj = -4.12 T-M
Mu,min = -176.05 T-M
As     = 213.24 cm2

As,req = 213.24 cm2
主筋: 44-#8  (As,pro = 222.95 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.55
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.45
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      78.08 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  4F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 135.36 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 171.70 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 133.33 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  3F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 135.36 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 171.70 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 133.33 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 56.26 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 75.73 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 62.61 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 84.27 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -625.97 T
Mu,maj = -10.66 T-M
Mu,min = -14.31 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -358.90 T
Mu,maj = 9.25 T-M
Mu,min = -56.26 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 66.32 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      29.19 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 111.89 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 112.02 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.66
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 190.25 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 183.48 (t-m)

Pu     = -1217.47 T
Mu,maj = -0.58 T-M
Mu,min = -81.69 T-M
As     = 104.36 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -966.74 T
Mu,maj = -26.63 T-M
Mu,min = 190.25 T-M
As     = 147.47 cm2

As,req = 147.47 cm2
主筋: 32-#8  (As,pro = 162.14 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.66
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      75.05 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 604.75) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

  B   = 55cm

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 10-#8

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 99.06 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 141.69 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 55.31 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 83.96 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 63.57 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 90.93 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -732.05 T
Mu,maj = -19.21 T-M
Mu,min = -12.99 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -422.98 T
Mu,maj = 1.11 T-M
Mu,min = -55.31 T-M

As,req = 81.00 cm2
主筋: 16-#8  (As,pro = 81.07 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.47
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.53
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      25.52 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm
