  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.08(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 159.38 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 122.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 124.21 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 89.84 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(117.92, 145.00, 392.25) = 117.92 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (117.92 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 3.99 cm2

X 方向 柱底
  2F B11(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 13-#8 + 3.99(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 122.74 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 171.24 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 89.85 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 132.88 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 99.01 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 102.66 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.92
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 235.50 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 245.04 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB15 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1314.63 T
Mu,maj = -8.99 T-M
Mu,min = 98.62 T-M
As     = 151.52 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1018.07 T
Mu,maj = 26.10 T-M
Mu,min = -245.04 T-M
As     = 245.70 cm2

As,req = 252.62 cm2
主筋: 52-#8  (As,pro = 263.48 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.92
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -79.12 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

  AST = 10-#8 + 8.80(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 134.85 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 110.01 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 114.57 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 80.66 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.00 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.87 cm2

  2F B8(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  ASB = 8-#8

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 182.09 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 80.65 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 149.44 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 116.27 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 129.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.78
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 183.53 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 216.32 (t-m)

======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB5 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1396.87 T
Mu,maj = -149.94 T-M
Mu,min = -19.18 T-M
As     = 165.12 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1456.72 T
Mu,maj = -15.41 T-M
Mu,min = -216.32 T-M
As     = 293.80 cm2

As,req = 314.77 cm2
主筋: 64-#8  (As,pro = 324.29 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.78
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -83.74 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.76 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 4-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 124.21 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 53.38 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 71.84 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.55
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 59.40 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 82.12 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB1 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -657.73 T
Mu,maj = -15.75 T-M
Mu,min = 7.86 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -383.68 T
Mu,maj = -15.85 T-M
Mu,min = -53.38 T-M
As     = 64.00 cm2

As,req = 166.89 cm2
主筋: 36-#8  (As,pro = 182.41 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.45
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.55
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      28.78 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.44

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.56
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      26.16 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 116.44 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 129.18 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.78
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 190.47 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 214.71 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.42
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.78
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      85.64 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =    9750.00 cm2
Ac      =    8174.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.724 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(196.38, 295.00, 607.50) = 196.38 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (196.38 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.96 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  3F B6(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 14-#8 + 8.96(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 183.48 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 135.41 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 150.39 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.08 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.13, 295.00, 607.50) = 195.13 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (195.13 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.88 cm2

X 方向 柱底

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 8.88(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 9-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 159.38 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 122.71 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 132.58 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 89.85 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.53
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 96.18 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 63.37 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 74.30 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 50.36 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.47
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  3F B1(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 12-#8 + 4.13(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 10-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 159.69 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 135.30 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 124.44 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 99.04 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 142.17 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (119.42 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.08 cm2

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 132.88 (t-m)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 98.45 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 102.08 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.90
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 231.67 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 241.06 (t-m)

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB17 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1324.08 T
Mu,maj = -4.54 T-M
Mu,min = -88.27 T-M
As     = 156.11 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱底控制)
Pu     = -1043.21 T
Mu,maj = -15.11 T-M
Mu,min = -241.06 T-M
As     = 244.83 cm2

As,req = 249.78 cm2
主筋: 52-#8  (As,pro = 263.48 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.35
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.90
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -78.83 T (COMB50 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.92
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

======================================================================================================================================================

Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(120.25, 145.00, 262.25) = 120.25 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (120.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.13 cm2

X 方向 柱頂
  3F B3(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 63.11 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 46.89 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.89
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 142.64 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 96.35 (t-m)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.39
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.89
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      40.32 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      70.73 cm
Ag      =    6400.00 cm2
Ac      =    5184.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.424 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 86.07 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 56.70 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcu_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 88.69 (t-m)
Mcu_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 56.40 (t-m)

Pu     = -800.32 T
Mu,maj = 21.46 T-M
Mu,min = -18.70 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1024.58 T
Mu,maj = 16.51 T-M
Mu,min = -86.07 T-M

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.48
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底分配彎矩
R_bottom = Mc / fabs (Mc + Mc_down) = 0.52
Mcp_bottom_clock    = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = R_bottom * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 250 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      45.74 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(119.42, 145.00, 252.50) = 119.42 cm

T 型梁內版筋總量 = (119.42 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.08 cm2

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.11
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 30.38 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 29.20 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(6) 柱主筋配筋
======================================================================================================================================================
彈性分析鋼筋設計 (COMB39 Min 載重組合控制)
Pu     = -1379.82 T
Mu,maj = -45.78 T-M
Mu,min = -215.14 T-M
As     = 174.44 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -1039.85 T
Mu,maj = -4.29 T-M
Mu,min = -30.38 T-M
As     = 100.00 cm2

As,req = 191.72 cm2
主筋: 40-#8  (As,pro = 202.68 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.11
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -72.42 T (COMB46 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      90.73 cm
Ag      =   10000.00 cm2
Ac      =    8464.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 147.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 80.65 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.59 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(195.00, 295.00, 509.75) = 195.00 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.13
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 34.78 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 30.87 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.13
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      50.35 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =   10500.00 cm2
Ac      =    8844.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.784 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.27 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.84 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.21
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =       5.99 T (COMB54 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.156 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.156 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =     -47.95 T (COMB76 Min 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      65.73 cm
Ag      =   10500.00 cm2
Ac      =    8844.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.784 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.394 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 1.27 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 8-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.84 cm2 / cm

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================

Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (僅一側翼板) bf = min(bw + Ln/12, bw + 6 * ts, bw + Ls1 / 2) = min(119.42, 145.00, 262.25) = 119.42 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm

  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 124.21 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (129.25 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 4.70 cm2

  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 61.51 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 34.09 (t-m)

版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.18
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 18.89 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 26.12 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

======================================================================================================================================================

Pu     = -918.38 T
Mu,maj = -177.54 T-M
Mu,min = -24.70 T-M
As     = 113.51 cm2

強柱弱梁分析鋼筋設計 (柱頂控制)
Pu     = -407.67 T
Mu,maj = 6.13 T-M
Mu,min = 18.89 T-M
As     = 81.00 cm2

As,req = 115.65 cm2
主筋: 24-#8  (As,pro = 121.61 cm2)

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.18
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      37.64 T (COMB48 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      80.73 cm
Ag      =    8100.00 cm2
Ac      =    6724.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.51 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 2-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.34 cm2 / cm

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.08
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 21.93 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 21.08 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.08
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      71.76 T (COMB76 Max 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =      90.73 cm
Ag      =   10000.00 cm2
Ac      =    8464.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.544 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(9) 柱圍束區及中央區之箍筋量配置
======================================================================================================================================================
(major)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(minor)
圍束區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 10 Ash / S = 0.63 cm2 / cm
中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm

(4) 求梁彎矩強度和 Σ φb x Mbn (1.0fy, φb = 0.65 ~ 0.9) 與 Σ φb x Mbp (1.25fy, φb = 1.0)
======================================================================================================================================================
考慮 T 型梁 (雙翼板) bf = min(Ln/4, bw + 8 * ts + 8 * ts, bw + (Ls1 + Ls2) / 2) = min(193.88, 295.00, 483.50) = 193.88 cm
版配筋 #4@20(fy=4200)
T 型梁內版筋總量 = (193.88 - 55) / 20 * 1.27 = 8.80 cm2

  2F B7(55x70)
  B   = 55cm
  D   = 70cm
  AST = 11-#8 + 8.80(only for Mnb) cm2
  ASB = 8-#8
  φb x Mbpc_clock    = 110.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbpc_cntclock = 147.03 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_clock    = 80.63 (t-m)
  φb x Mbnc_cntclock = 123.45 (t-m)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

(5) 強柱弱梁設計分配彎矩
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.19
Mcu_top_clock    = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_clock)    = 18.79 (t-m)
Mcu_top_cntclock = R_top * 1.2Σ(φb x Mbn_sum_cntclock) = 28.78 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱

(7) 求柱設計剪力(梁 Mpr: Fs = 1.25Fy, φ = 1.0 , 韌性分析剪力)
======================================================================================================================================================
柱頂分配彎矩
R_top = Mc / fabs (Mc_up - Mc) = 0.19
Mcp_top_clock    = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_clock)    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_top_cntclock = R_top * fabs(Mpb_sum_cntclock) = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

柱底無梁傳入彎矩、或為最低樓層之柱，因此改為依據柱端配筋之彎矩分配
Mcp_bottom_clock    = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)
Mcp_bottom_cntclock = -62774385622041929000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000.00 (t-m)

Vp = (Mtop - Mbot) / Hn
Hn           = 395 (cm)
Vcp_clock    = 0.00 (t)
Vcp_cntclock = 0.00 (t)
Vp           = 0.00 (t)

(8) 計算柱橫向鋼筋
======================================================================================================================================================
柱圍束區箍筋量之公式:
Ash / S = 0.30 x hc x (Ag / Ac - 1) x (fc' / fy)-----eq.(1)
Ash / S = 0.09 x hc x (fc' / fy)---------------------eq.(2)
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

柱中央區剪力筋之公式:
Av / S  = (Vu,max / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)---------------eq.(3)
Av / S  = (Vp / φ - Vc) / (fy x d)-------------------eq.(4)

(major)
IF Pu < 0.05Agfc', Vc = 0
Vu(max) =      51.22 T (COMB44 載重組合控制)
Vp      =       0.00 T
hc      =     100.73 cm
Ag      =    9900.00 cm2
Ac      =    8364.00 cm2

Ash / S =      0.484 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

(minor)
Ash / S =      0.604 cm2 / cm (圍束區) <--- 由 eq.(2) 控制
Avh / S =      0.000 cm2 / cm (中央區) <--- 由 eq.(3) 控制

======================================================================================================================================================

中央區: (Hoop: 1-#4 + Ties: 3-#4) @ 15 Ash / S = 0.42 cm2 / cm
